entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Lewisporte
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:59 AM NST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow Shower and Blowing Snow, -1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gander Int'l Airport 10:30 AM NST Friday 10 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow Shower and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -1.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -2.2°C
Wind: NNW 39 km/h gust 50 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Freezing drizzle or flurries changing to flurries near noon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Flurries changing to snow at times heavy this evening. Amount 15 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast overnight. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast in the morning and early in the afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 10 March 2023
